ai-anya-e0105n34:0_0: if she urges her on account of what is need;
ai-anya-e0105n34:1_0: Exceptting theminent merchant’s name, Āpaṇa, and he the eighth sectarians, and his own desires in the neighbourhood of his own thoughts.
ai-anya-e0105n34:1_1: for this is said in the Paṭisambhidā:
ai-anya-e0105n34:2_0: “Having worshipped the Supreme One, after worshipping the Lord of Men,
ai-anya-e0105n34:3_0: for the sake of my hair and beard,
ai-anya-e0105n34:4_0: or transformed by the waters, too.
ai-anya-e0105n34:6_0: There is no blameworthy in the Noble Ones’ teaching,
ai-anya-e0105n34:7_0: Just so, who had been steady in the Teacher’s instructions,
ai-anya-e0105n34:8_0: Therefore I wish to give up what is beneficial,
ai-anya-e0105n34:9_0: Relying on the Realm of the Dispensation of the Dhamma,
ai-anya-e0105n34:10_0: Who leads over the True Dhamma’s welfare,
ai-anya-e0105n34:11_0: please listen to the mangoes of other mangoes.”
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_0: But Many soothsayers tell him, “Whoever has gained faith in the teachers, since he is calling him a teacher, he is like one who’s gone.”
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_1: And no matter how this teacher is undecided, since he makes his fists, with the Buddha’s virtue and the kind described, etc., originates in somewhere from others.
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_2: Again, he thinks, “I’ll do what I have said,” and “I’ll do what they do.” But he does. Then he think, “I’ll make such a path that.” But there is no such thing, however, I shall make amends for it.
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_3: Again and again he explained the teachers of the four enemy, and the teachers, saying: “Whoever is the teaching of the four noble ones, who is not satisfied,” and he explained the method of the teaching, and there is no obstacle for him to the instruction, saying, “Haves such a teacher,” and he explained the instructions.
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_4: Therefore it is not appropriate to speak to the word of the Buddhas.
ai-anya-e0105n34:12_5: For it is like a teacher who goes on the opposite directions, in the Full of the Teacher’s instructions, and because of the Teacher’s instructions and their own giving and the knowledge of the Teacher’s instructions, and do not contradict the Faith with knowledge, “Where do not discussing knowledge.”
